ModInfo.Name: [Tsunamods] Card-RF
ModInfo.Author: Ducladoncladon & Hobbitdur
ModInfo.Description: - Card-RF is a graphical update to the beloved Triple Triad minigame! Which can now be played in full 60 FPS thanks to FFNx! - Using original reference artworks from Final Fantasy 8 and higher, and a combination of AI upscaling and many hours of manual touch ups and corrections, we have brought this amazing minigame to a more modern appearance
